column1: Topic title: Perak PAS chief shares PAS Umno  Pan Malay Islamic

column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/378894Perak PAS chief shares PAS-Umno 'Pan-Malay Islamic gov't' hopes12 April 2017Perak PAS chief Razman Zakaria today revealed aspirations for a PAS-Umno "pan-Malay Muslim government".Razman, who is a PAS central committee member, said the government would consist of 80 PAS MPs, 40 Umno MPs and 45 MPs from Sabah and Sarawak. He did not say which parties the East Malaysian MPs would be from.PAS president Abdul Hadi Awang will be the prime minister of this government, which he hopes will be formed after the 14th general election, he said in a posting on Facebook...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
